name: csf

scope.description: Scope from which to retrieve the Security Fabric tree [vdom*|global].

all_vdoms.description: Include information from all VDOMs that the admin can access. Only applies for scope=vdom

GET.summary:
Retrieve a full tree of downstream FortiGates registered to the Security Fabric.
Access Group: any

help: Retrieve a full tree of downstream FortiGates registered to the Security Fabric.

protocol_enabled.name: protocol_enabled
protocol_enabled.title: Security Protocol Enabled
protocol_enabled.description: True if the Security Fabric protocol is enabled, otherwise false.

csf_group_name.name: csf_group_name
csf_group_name.title: Security Fabric Name
csf_group_name.description: Name of the Security Fabric group.

pending.name: pending
pending.title: Pending Devices
pending.description: Devices that are pending authorization to join the Security Fabric.

trusted.name: trusted
trusted.title: Pre-Authorized Devices
trusted.description: Devices that are pre-authorized to join the Security Fabric.

devices.name: devices
devices.title: Security Fabric Devices Type Map
devices.description: Map of Security Fabric device types in the topology to an array of devices.

faceplate_map.name: faceplate_map
faceplate_map.title: Chassis Faceplate Map
faceplate_map.description: Map of SLBC blade serials to their faceplate XML.

response_description: Information on the Security Fabric that this FortiGate is a member of.

scope.name: scope
scope.summary: Scope from which to retrieve the Security Fabric tree [vdom*|global].

all_vdoms.name: all_vdoms
all_vdoms.summary: Include information from all VDOMs that the admin can access. Only applies for scope=vdom
